Reviews.Title: Very happy with the purchase
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use, high quality and very competitively priced. Easy to hook up, sturdy. It picks up voices clearly. I give this product a 5 star rating.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed!
Reviews.Author: Michael K.
Reviews.Content: Does exactly what I needed it to.  For the price - it is perfect.  I wouldn't use it to record a choir, but to pick up conersations in my showroom for the security cameras it is great!

Reviews.Title: so far so good.
Reviews.Author: Soupman
Reviews.Content: just started using the mike this week so ask me in like a year to get a better more accurate response.

Reviews.Title: It's ok, nothing special
Reviews.Author: Scott McPartland
Reviews.Content: Microphone works, but you get an annoying buzzing sound in the background. But for the price what more can you really ask for. Overall, it gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Eric So "The Chiman"
Reviews.Content: The mic didn't even work. It just fed back sound as if it was a speaker. Don't waste your time.
